version_description:
- Multi-account support. Add multiple accounts to the app by long-pressing on your profile picture
- Browsing for following/followers lists
- Character limits and other configuration now loaded from your server's API
- If you accidentally scrolled to top by tapping the Mastodon logo, tap it again to return to the previous spot
- Fixes for voice over support
- Other fixes and improvements

- Fixes for voice over support
- Other fixes and improvements
